    level="1"

>
[Lock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2731)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Picking a poor lock requires two successful DC 15 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks, a simple lock requires three successful DC 20 Thievery checks, an average lock requires four successes at DC 25, a good lock requires five successes at DC 30, and a superior lock six successes at DC 40.

</column>
